data.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
data.author: Wayne Gretzky

data.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
data.author: Robert Frost

data.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
data.author: Thomas Edison

data.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: All the darkness in the world cannot extinguish the light of a single candle.
data.author: St. Francis of Assisi

data.quote: 休言万事转头空，未转头时皆梦。
data.author: 苏轼

data.quote: 枯藤老树昏鸦，小桥流水人家，古道西风瘦马。夕阳西下，断肠人在天涯。
data.author: 马致远

data.quote: 残雪凝辉冷画屏，落梅横笛已三更，更无人处月胧明。
data.author: 纳兰性德

data.quote: 铁盒的序变成了日记，变成了空气，演化成回忆，印象中的爱情好像，抵不住那时间，所以你弃权。
data.author: Jay

data.quote: 墙里秋千墙外道。墙外行人，墙里佳人笑。
data.author: 苏轼

data.quote: 树深时见鹿，溪午不闻钟。
data.author: 李白

data.quote:
君不见黄河之水天上来，奔流到海不复回。
君不见高堂明镜悲白发，朝如青丝暮成雪。
data.author: 李白
